title: Smart Fitting Room
description: Pilot launch of interactive fitting experience
credits: As part of Random Studio for PVH
lede: As part of Digital Retail Experience team at Random Studio, we designed and launched the Smart Fitting Room pilot in two of our client's stores in Europe.

text.heading: Insight
text.text: Fitting rooms are the bottom funnel of a sale. However, most of them are generic spaces, when they could be environments optimized to make customers feel comfortable and confident in their choices.

text.heading: Idea
text.text: Utilizing integrated RFID technology, motion sensors, and LED lighting, our MVP solution aims to provide a seamless shopping experience, assisting customers in finding their perfect fit.

text.heading: End Result
text.text: Connected service allows customers to easily check and request alternative sizes and styles without having to leave the fitting room, saving their time and effort. Digital controls let them set the desired environment where they could feel most confident.

text.heading: Process
text.text: Through research and ideation, we crafted a concept that was further validated with the development of a high-fidelity prototype. Leveraging feedback from stakeholders and targeted user interviews, we iteratively refined the design before implementing a pilot in the store.

Following the pilot launch, we refined the experience based on interviews with store associates and data analytics reports. This iterative process formed a crucial part of our continuous development efforts, ensuring ongoing enhancement and optimization of the product.
